com.zendesk.sdk.network

Interface NetworkAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticlesListFragment, ArticlesSearchResultsFragment, CategoriesListFragment, ContactZendeskActivity, LabeledArticlesListFragment, NetworkAwareActionbarActivity, RequestActivity, RequestListFragment, SectionsListFragment, SupportActivity, SupportListFragment, ViewArticleActivity, ViewRequestActivity

    public interface NetworkAware
    Interface to indicate that an implementer is aware of changes to network state

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNetworkAvailable()
      Called when network connectivity is available
      void onNetworkUnavailable()
      Called when network connectivity is unavailable.
